participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, often lost in her own thoughts but loves to explore new ideas.
participant_1.background: i don't have many friends. i've blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i love to play pobox. i hate school. i'm a 12 year old girl.

participant_2.name: Siddhartha
participant_2.personality: Calm and reflective, he enjoys deep conversations and seeks understanding through spirituality.
participant_2.background: i am a buddhist. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i have not spoken in three months. i like meditation. i live in alaska.

content.text: I do n't have a lot of time for that. What do you do for a living?
